titleStmt.title: A conference between the ghost of the Rump and Tom Tel-Troth. Together with her sad complaint of that dismall and total eclipse that is like to fall out on the 20th day of April, 1660.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Mris Nurse the Rumps late matron, and are to be sold at Kings-land-Court ...,

notesStmt.note: Place and date of publication suggested by Wing (2nd ed.).
Imperfect: print show-through with loss of text.
